metadata.name: Everything Will Be Fine
metadata.description:
"Happiness" exists everywhere.
It is not as easily found as a bright flower, but as small as a seed.

We can find it in the cracks of the days,
in the shadows of back alleys,
in yawning kittens,
in swaying grass,
in bubbles coming from somewhere.

That varies from person to person. And we have many overlapping answers.
It represents the contours of our hearts and is important for us to understand each other.

May your heart be at peace.
Everything will be fine.
